importContacts.q: How do I import my contacts?
importContacts.a: You can import your contacts via a CSV file from the Contacts page. Click 'Import CSV' and follow the instructions. The file must contain at minimum the columns: email, name, first name.

configSES.q: How do I configure Amazon SES?
configSES.a: Go to Settings > SES Configuration. You will need your AWS access keys (Access Key ID and Secret Access Key). Don't forget to verify your sending domain in the AWS SES console.

scheduleCampaign.a: Yes, when creating a campaign, you can choose to send it immediately or schedule it for a later date and time.

createList.q: How do I create a contact list?
createList.a: Go to the Lists section, click 'New List', give it a name and description, then add your contacts from the list management page.

viewStats.q: Where can I see my campaign statistics?
viewStats.a: Global statistics are available in the Statistics section. To see details of a specific campaign, click on its name from the campaigns list.
